docs.abstract: Thomas L Friedman Op-Ed column offers highlights of interview he conducted with Pres Obama regarding climate change; notes that interview was conducted as Obama administration was drawing up new Environmental Protection Agency rules to curb carbon emissions from power plants.
docs.lead_paragraph: The president explains in an interview why the new E.P.A. rules on carbon are so pivotal.

headline.main: In John Kerry’s Mideast Speech, a Clash of Policies and Personalities
headline.print_headline: Two-State Plan Nears the End of Its Shelf Life

docs.abstract: New Analysis; Pres-elect Donald J Trump rushes to Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu's defense after Sec of State John Kerry harshly censure Israel in speech intended to salvage two-state solution; many see speech as eulogy for longstanding policy, supported by much of world.
docs.lead_paragraph: On one side, were Mr. Kerry and President Obama. On the other, President-elect Donald J. Trump and Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu of Israel, and time is on their side.

headline.main: Obama Administration Files Trade Challenge Against China
headline.print_headline: Obama Administration Files Trade Challenge Against China

docs.lead_paragraph: Amid new tensions with China, the Obama administration on Thursday launched its 15th challenge against Beijing at the Word Trade Organization, escalating a long-simmering debate over practices that U.S. officials say limit American farmers' ability to export rice, wheat and corn to the Asian powerhouse.

headline.main: The World Fears Trump’s America. That’s a Good Thing.
headline.print_headline: The World Is Scared Of Trump. That’s Good.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by historian Mark Moyar asserts United States benefits from Pres-elect Donald J Trump's stoking of fear, either by design or accident, in foreign leaders; argues Pres Obama's more conciliatory approach has deflated allies and emboldened enemies outside of Europe.
docs.lead_paragraph: Obama tried to make the world like the United States. Look where that got us.
